Class DSAppearance.Builder

  • com.docusign.androidsdk.dsmodels.DSAppearance.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DSAppearance

    public static class DSAppearance.Builder

    This class is used for building the DSAppearance Object

      Used to set StatusBar Color StatusBar color is applied to devices with OS >= LOLLIPOP
